Title: Rio 2
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Don Rhymer (screenplay by), Carlos Kotkin (screenplay by), Jenny Bicks (screenplay by), Yoni Brenner (screenplay by), Carlos Saldanha (story by), Laurie Craig (story consultant)
Actors: Jake T. Austin, Carlinhos Brown, Kristin Chenoweth, Jemaine Clement
Plot: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets the most fearsome adversary of all: his father-in-law.
Production: Blue Sky Studios, 20th Century Fox Animation
